Summary: Beneful helps keeps our dog healthy
text:
Our chocolate labrador has been eating Purina Beneful for over ten years. And she loves the stuff. We use the Beneful Original as a treat for her. She started out on the Original formula and gained too much weight. But I can't say whether that was the dog food, too many doggie treats from our oldest granddaughter or too many table scraps.

Whatever the reason, we switched over to PURINA Beneful Healthy Weight Dog Food, 15.5-Pound and she has it almost all the time now except for occasional "treats" of the Original Formula.

We feed her two cups twice a day and she is at a very sleek weight, especially considering her age and that she's not as active as she used to be. She likes both types (Original a little better) and eats it right down. Because it is a hard food mix, her teeth have remained healthy too. We've only had to get them cleaned once in ten years.

We are able to get this cheaper locally, usually at Target but sometimes at Walmart. For our dog, this has been a good choice and she has stayed very healthy on it - per her vet.
